text: 4.17-19: Stt 17.5; Ais 48.13; 1 Ko 1.28; Ef 2.1; 2.5; 1 Pi 2.104.17-19: Stt 15.5; Hi 11.14.17-19: Stt 17.17; 18.11; Hi 11.11-12Fhe Bakɨmen buni vhuuiŋ ki gap mba kameŋ suaŋgi, “Gu ndu muuŋgi, ndu harigi fhain ki gumgi gu mbigir vhɨrver ndia fara muuŋgi.” Kha kameŋ, ne Fhe Bakɨme nɨman havhargi.
